definitions.definition: A department of Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes , France . Capital: Moulins (INSEE code 03).
A left tributary of the Loire , in central France , flowing through the departments of Lozère , Ardèche , Haute-Loire , Puy-de-Dôme , Allier , Cher and Nièvre .

main_definition: A department of Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes , France . Capital: Moulins (INSEE code 03).
secondary_definitions: A left tributary of the Loire , in central France , flowing through the departments of Lozère , Ardèche , Haute-Loire , Puy-de-Dôme , Allier , Cher and Nièvre .
